attributes.action: Dogs to be kept on leads at all times
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dogs to be kept on leads in all public places (including park and woodland).
Make it a criminal offense to take them off. This would allow families to safely play with their children, and would also protect wildlife.
Parks are for the pubic, they are not dog toilets.
Extendible leads provide the exercise and freedom needed for the dog.
